author: curcuru
msg: Load iterations, preload from datalet.options;
Eliminate old-style performance reporting, is now
replaced with the logElement(..., "perf",...) call

author: curcuru
msg: Update Datalet construction to pass in a copy of
our testProps as the Datalet's options - this allows any
generic props set in our test to appear in any sort
of Datalets we create.  (Next step, later on: dynamically
create the appropriate class of Datalet via Testlet.getDefaultDatalet())

author: curcuru
msg: Add options member variable Properties - this is a catch-all
for future data members, so that the same StylesheetDatalet
can be used for performance testing as well. Comments on
Datalet design welcome (i.e. have each datalet have specific
member variables for it's testlet, for ease of testlet programming,
or move Datalets to more of an intelligent Properties/Hashtable metaphor?)

author: curcuru
msg: Greatly improved conformance testing engine: replaces
XSLDirectoryIterator, and has a generic XSL/Stylesheet
Testlet and Datalet; makes it much easier to iterate over
trees of conf, contrib, perf, whatever stylesheet tests and
can replace the Testlet algorithim easily

author: curcuru
msg: Various static utilities; a small collection of worker methods
that I've been using in several places
